meanings: the chairman of the Korea Sports Council

vlive.korean: '회장 아들 누구예요? 궁금해' 회장 아들은... "Who is son of CEO? I am curious." 듣기 View video SF9 : 저는 잘재울수있어요
vlive.english: "Who is son of CEO? I am curious."

vlive.korean: 어떻게 하면 회장이 될 수 있을까... How to be elected... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [WINNER] 혼약뭉강! 숙도남과 함께라면 어떤 문제도 문제 없다🤓👍 (HOONY talking about elementary school episode)
진짜 회장님 나오시냐고요? Is the CEO really coming out?? 듣기 View video SF9 : 🌰🌰
vlive.english: Is the CEO really coming out??

vlive.korean: 어떻게 하면 회장이 될 수 있을까? So how can we be elected? 듣기 View video WINNER : 숙제도우미(숙제 도와드립니다)
vlive.english: So how can we be elected?

vlive.korean: "회장 선거에서 어떻게 해?" "What should I do to win a presidential election?" 듣기 View video WINNER : 숙제도우미(숙제 도와드립니다)
vlive.english: "What should I do to win a presidential election?"

examples.korean: The visiting president was jostled by angry demonstrators. 발음듣기 방문 중인 회장이 성난 시위자들에게 거칠게 떠밀렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The visiting president was jostled by angry demonstrators. 발음

examples.korean: The elevator doors parted and out stepped the President. 발음듣기 엘리베이터 문이 갈라지더니[열리더니] 대통령[회장]이 걸어 나왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The elevator doors parted and out stepped the President. 발음

examples.korean: He was ousted as chairman. 발음듣기 그는 의장[회장] 자리에서 쫓겨났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was ousted as chairman. 발음

examples.korean: the man designated to succeed the president 발음듣기 회장 뒤를 이을 사람으로 지명된 남성 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the man designated to succeed the president 발음

examples.korean: the founder and president of the company 발음듣기 그 회사의 창립자이자 회장 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the founder and president of the company 발음
